content: gelato water bottle bag is my forth pattern in my gelato collection decided to make this one a free pattern so you can try this wavy striped pattern and see if you like it this wavy water bottle bag is a quick and quite easy project once you get use to the wavy pattern it s also a perfect scrap project so i hope you enjoy it pattern details skill level beginner to intermediate materials required - sport weight yarn scraps in your choice of colors sample is made with drops - safran and i used 40g - 3 mm crochet hook finished size fits most standard water bottles size is adjustable with your hook size
